group_1.textCenter: We haven't been able to play at the beach at all,@and the camp ends tomorrow!

group_1.textLeft: We had a lot of fun, didn't we?

group_1.textRight: Yeah, but...Rena and Kaede...

group_1.textLeft: Oh, Ui, don't worry about it, okay?
If everyone else had fun, then that's a good thing!
Besides, we still have tomorrow.
We should rent a boat or a float from the beach@house, and have a lot of fun!

group_1.textRight: Well, if you've got something you want to do,@you should wake up early tomorrow.

group_1.textLeft: Oh yeah, because we have to catch the bus...

group_1.textRight: Yep yep!

group_1.textLeft: It feels like a waste, but I think we better get to@bed early tonight.
I've already had dinner and a bath, so I'll go@brush my teeth.

group_1.textRight: I want to play a game!

group_1.textLeft: But we all have to go to bed...

group_1.textRight: That's just what Rena and the others want to do!

group_1.textLeft: Alright, how about we play a round of cards?

group_1.textRight: Yeah, that's what I'm talking about, Momoko!

group_1.textLeft: Oh, hey Yachiyo. Where are you going?

group_1.textRight: I think I'll use the rest of today to prepare for@our trip home tomorrow.

group_1.textLeft: We'll help!

group_1.textRight: It's fine. Take it easy, you two.

group_1.textLeft: Ah...

group_1.textRight: ...Rena, should we go follow Yachiyo?

group_1.textLeft: I was just about to say that!

group_1.textRight: Yachiyo!

group_1.textLeft: [chara:100201:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Hm?!
Rena...?! Kaede...!

group_1.textRight: What's going on? You're not supposed to be@outside.

group_1.textLeft: Erm...

group_1.textRight: And you have...fireworks?
Wait, are you going to shoot fireworks all by@yourself?!

group_1.textLeft: Idiot. That's not what's happening here.
She must have been thinking about the fireworks@while the three of us were at the beach house.
You were prepping this for all of us, weren't you?

group_1.textRight: Oh, I remember. Yachiyo went shopping on her@own when we went back to the camp today!
Or...not...?

group_1.textLeft: ...Well, I guess it's true, but...
I was supposed to be supervising everyone while@we were studying and playing, but...
I saw how happy everyone looked, and...
I don't know, I just thought it would be fun to@do fireworks at night...

group_1.textRight: I think that's a great idea...!

group_1.textLeft: Thank you.
I thought I'd buy fireworks on the way home@today, but...
It looks like everyone's off doing their own thing.
I don't want to force them to do this.

group_1.textRight: But what about the fireworks?!

group_1.textLeft: It's too much effort to take this home, so I'll@dispose of it before we leave.

group_1.textRight: That would be such a waste!
Yachiyo, you stink!
We should get everyone together and have a@fireworks show!

group_1.textLeft: [chara:100201:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Huh?!
But everyone is getting ready for bed...

group_1.textRight: Let's invite them and see what happens!

group_1.textLeft: You're going to help me...?
